channel.title: The Australian Dirt-Track Championships
channel.description:
No, I did not race. It was for the Open class. But I did get a very respected job. Since I'm a recognised member of Raymond Terrace Motorcycling Club, I got to be the Starter. And Team Yamaha's "helper" :o My ears are still wringing, because I would stand in this tower, with my friend, (Jake) Every race, Jake and I would run down, pull the gates up with Gate-Picks, run to the tower. Wait 10 Minutes, then the riders would come to their starting grid, just after the previous race finished. It was the best fun. Jake and I got food passes, and we were aloud to help ourself to Team Yamaha's food box (Jake rides a 02' Yz85 Small wheel, and I ride a '06 Yz85BW) It was great. I got to meet some Factory Team Yamaha riders. I got everything. I was spoilt like a king. I even got a put around on the new 07' Yz85's (only like 10 metres, then I hit the other team's pit-area)
If anyone went to Raymond Terrace Motorcycling Club track. You might have seen me :o I was doing the Gates.

item.title: The Australian Dirt-Track Championships
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

^^ Good for you^^

Read full topic
